argument.name: data
argument.description: An array of JSON objects with data to populate the ViewBox with.

argument.name: flagKeepValue
argument.description: Optional. true/false - default false - should the currently selected value in the ViewBox be kept selected after the ViewBox has been re-populated.

argument.name: animate
argument.description: Optional. Default false - should the ViewBox be animated as it is repopulated. Can be false, or an object with properties: 'type' and 'duration'. 'type' can be 'slide-left' or 'slide-right'.

page.description: Populates a ViewBox with new data. Only applies if the ViewBox type is set to 'Data' on the Data Source tab in the ViewBox Builder.
